transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Krishna sir? Krishna? Hello?
Customer: Yes sir. Mamta this side from IndiaMART.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Yes, actually you have requested to change your mail ID and number as well, right?
Customer: Yeah, mail ID will be changed.
Executive: Yes, okay. So have you installed the IndiaMART app in your phone, sir?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay, please put your phone on a speaker and go to the IndiaMART portal, sir.
Customer: Okay, just wait.
Executive: Hmm. And are you comfortable in Hindi also, sir?
Customer: No, I don't know Hindi.
Executive: Accha, no issue sir, no issue.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm. And click on homepage.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm, then you will click on left side, you will you have three line in in your left side on your phone sir, please click on that.
Customer: I am in laptop.
Executive: Accha, laptop, okay, okay, no issues. Go to the profile section.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, then additional details.
Customer: Okay, edit option is here, our profile edit option. No, no, primary detail and then you will you have one option is edit. Please click on edit option, sir.
Customer: Edit, okay.
Executive: Click on edit option, then your primary mail ID is started from one second, sir.
Executive: Hmm, one second sir, one second.
Executive: Hmm. Your primary mail ID as mentioned starting from N, click on edit option. There is a pencil icon on in your primary email ID, please click on pencil icon.
Executive: Then put your new mail ID there.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Then click on save option, sir.
Customer: Okay, it's saying email ID is already in use.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: It seems like email ID is already in use.
Executive: One second.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: You want to add new mail ID that is order@strideind.com, correct?
Customer: order@strideind.com.
Executive: Already registered. I think you have another free account on IndiaMART portal, that's why it's not we are unable to add it. Please put your new mail ID.
Customer: No, no, I have already talked to your staff, the old account will be already deleted. Never use it.
Executive: But it's one second sir, I am sharing you the video meet link so that I can check your ek minute sir, one minute.
Executive: Have you logged in your mail ID starting from N so that I can share you the video meet link?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: One second sir.
Executive: Please check your mail sir. Your mail ID which is mentioned there, please check your mail ID. You will receive the video meet link on that sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Nandu.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Sorry, do you please send the link in this number, this office number, WhatsApp.
Executive: Sorry, sorry sir.
Customer: You can please send this video link in this number, you calling this number, office number. This is my one second, I am sharing you on WhatsApp also. One second.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: One second.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Please join from here sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And I am joining you on video meet sir. I am cutting this phone from here and join you in there.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change mail ID and number.

- Unable to change email ID.

- Wants the video meet link on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive guided the process to change email ID.

- Informed that email ID is already registered.

- Shared video meet link on email and WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will connect on video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, profile, video meet, whatsapp
